ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Therefore turn from them for a time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So turn away from them for a time
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Leave them alone for a while,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Stay away from them for a while
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And turn away from them for some time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, turn away from them for a while,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And turn away from them till a time
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So turn thou from them for a while,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So turn away from them for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And turn thou aside from them for a season.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So leave them alone for a while,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So turn thou away from them for a little while,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So turn (O Muhammad SAW) away from them for a while,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So turn (away) from them for a while,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So avoid them for a while.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And leave them for a time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:178] So leave them for a while,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Withdraw from them) turn away from, Muhammad, (awhile) until they are destroyed at Badr.
